lead_paragraph: A task force that reviewed false reports of shots being fired at the airport in August said poor communication and blurred lines of authority contributed to a wave of panic.

headline.print_headline: Lack of Protocol Added to Chaos During J.F.K. Scare, Inquiry Finds
headline.main: Lack of Protocol Added to Chaos During J.F.K. Scare, Inquiry Finds

snippet: A task force that reviewed false reports of shots being fired at the airport in August said poor communication and blurred lines of authority contributed to a wave of panic....
abstract: New York State and federal investigation into how false reports of gunfire at Kennedy International Airport in August spread mass panic reveals serious lapses in security protocols, training and coordination; episode raises concerns about what would have happened in event of actual shooting.
